CmdLine: pacman -Syy --noconfirm &&     pacman --noconfirm -S                 inetutils                 libxv                 virtualgl                 lib32-virtualgl                 mesa-demos                 lib32-mesa-demos &&     mkdir /opt/VirtualGL &&     ln -s /usr/bin /opt/VirtualGL &&     localepurge &&     rm -r /usr/share/man/* &&     rm -r /usr/share/doc/* &&     find /. -name "*~" -type f -delete &&     bash -c "echo 'y' | pacman -Scc >/dev/null 2>&1" &&     paccache -rk0 >/dev/null 2>&1 &&      pacman-optimize &&     rm -r /var/lib/pacman/sync/*
Commands.Name: run
